_instructions: This file defines the positions of AprilTags on the field for vision-based pose estimation.
For official FRC field layouts, download from: https://github.com/wpilibsuite/allwpilib/tree/main/apriltag/src/main/native/resources/edu/wpi/first/apriltag
Or use the WPILib AprilTag layout editor: https://docs.wpilib.org/en/stable/docs/software/vision-processing/apriltag/apriltag-intro.html
Place the appropriate field layout file (e.g., 2024-crescendo.json) in this deploy directory and update Vision.java constant
